title: Apples And Oranges
description:
Mr. Dengklek is tidying up his harvest. He has $A$ apples and $J$ oranges in his basket. Help Mr. Dengklek calculate the total number of fruits he has in total. Given two integers $A$ and $J$, output their sum. ### FORMAT INPUT A single line containing two space-separated integers $A$ and $J$ ($0 \le A, J \le 1000$). ### FORMAT OUTPUT A single line containing one integer representing the total number of fruits. ### EXAMPLE INPUT/OUTPUT
Input
33 34
Output
67
Input
10 0
Output
10
template:
import sys

def total_fruits(a, j):
    # WRITE YOUR CODE IN HERE
    return 0

line = sys.stdin.read().split()
if len(line) == 2:
    a = int(line[0])
    j = int(line[1])
    print(total_fruits(a, j))
